text: Poing is a municipality in the Upper Bavarian district of Ebersberg, being east of central Munich. ==Geography== Poing is about NE of Munich and is serviced by the Munich S-Bahn (S2) and MVV Bus systems. Poing has two constituent communities named Angelbrechting and Grub. Poing is bordered on the east by Anzing and Markt Schwaben, Pliening in the North, Kirchheim to the West and Parsdorf to the South. ==References== ==Other websites== * History/last days of the war in Poing Category:Ebersberg (district)
title: Poing, Bavaria
